description: This file is an HTML source for a web-based database visualizer interface, including CSS styles and JavaScript code for dynamic functionality such as loading database lists, tables, and data, with interactive features.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of databases and updates the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Handles the refresh button click to reload database list.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses database entry to show tables.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches tables of a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Loads and displays data for a selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Renders table data into HTML with support for wide content and expandable cells.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Renders individual cell content, including handling objects and long strings.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content for long text or objects.
